title: Subtle Medicine
description: 125 poems to help you reconnect with the Fire . Wind . Earth . Water . The visible and invisible threads weaving this wild world together. Somewhere along the way, weâ€™ve lost touch with them. The natural world has become a distant relative, rather than an intimate part of us. This book is an attempt to bring us back to our wild roots.We become the Fire through passion. We become the Wind through freedom. We become the Earth through grounding. We become the Water through flowing with life.Four trees planted for every book sold.
author: Joey Doherty
